name.en: Experiments of Electrical Circuits and Electronics

goal.en: This course is an experimental course that is matched with “Electrical Circuits and Electronics(ME2065-B).“ The goal is to lead students to observe and verify the knowledge learned in theoretical courses through the practice of circuits. Through the experimental content matched with the theoretical course, students are familiarized with the eletric circuits and components.Accordingly, students can understand the course content of theory and practices.
goal.ch: 本課程是與電路及電子學互相搭配的實驗課程，最終目的是希望藉由電路的實作練習帶領學生實際觀察、驗證理論課程所學習的知識。透過與理論課程搭配的實驗內容一步步熟悉電路原理及元件特性與使用方法，以漸進的方式使學員了解課程內容。

content.en: 12 Labs related to electric circuits. The topics of these labs including: (1) electric meter and power supply devices, (2) resistive network analysis, (3) Thevenin and Norton equivalent law, (4) oscilloscope and oscilloscope, (5) I-V curve measurement, (6) time domain dynamic characteristics measurement, (7) frequency domain dynamic characteristic measurement, (8) operational amplifier, (9) transistor amplifier circuit, (10) homemade telephone intercom.
content.ch:
基礎實驗10個：
LAB01三用電表及電源供應器使用；
LAB02電阻網路分析實驗；
LAB03戴維寧及諾頓等效定律實驗；
LAB04產波器及示波器使用；
LAB05靜態特性量測I-V曲線；
LAB06時域動態特性量測頻階響應；
LAB07頻域動態特性量測頻域響應；
LAB08運算放大器；
LAB09電晶體放大電路一(直流偏壓)；
LAB10電晶體放大電路二(交流放大)。
進階實驗2個：
LAB11自製電話對講機(一)；
LAB12自製電話對講機(二)。

textbook.ch: 使用機械系電電實驗課程自編講義

grading.en: The 11 experiments are assigned according to the difficulty, and each can get 5-12％ of the upper limit of the score. The quality of the report will be used as a reference for score adjustment.
grading.ch: 11個實驗依照難度分配，分別可得5-12％的分數上限，結報的品質做為分數調整參考。
